member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute
member.summary: Represents the metadata that describes the advertised API versions.
member.remarks: Advertised API versions indicate the existence of other versioned API, but the implementation of those APIs are implemented elsewhere.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion,Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of other API versions.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParser,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The parser used to parse the specified versions.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParser,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The parser used to parse the specified versions.
An array of other API version strings.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of other numeric API versions.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of other API version strings.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.AdvertiseApiVersionsAttribute.Deprecated
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified set of API versions are deprecated.
member.value: True if the specified set of API versions are deprecated; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

The inner exception that caused the current exception, if any.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.AmbiguousApiVersionException.ApiVersions
member.summary: Gets a read-only list of the ambiguous API versions.
member.value: A read-only list of unparsed, ambiguous API versions.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.Default
member.summary: Gets the default API version.
member.value: The default API version, which is always "1.0".

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.Neutral
member.summary: Gets the neutral API version.
member.value: The neutral API version.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.GroupVersion
member.summary: Gets the group version.
member.value: The group version or null.
member.remarks: If the group version is specified, only the date component is considered.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.MajorVersion
member.summary: Gets the major version number.
member.value: The major version number or null.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.MinorVersion
member.summary: Gets the minor version number.
member.value: The minor version number or null.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.Status
member.summary: Gets the optional version status.
member.value: The version status.
member.remarks: The version status typically allows services to indicate pre-release or test versions that are not release quality or guaranteed to be supported. Example values might include "Alpha", "Beta", "RC", etc.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.ToString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the text representation of the version using the specified format and format provider.
member.param: The format to return the text representation in. The value can be null or empty.
member.returns: The string representation of the version.
member.exception: The specified is not one of the supported format values.

member.summary: Overloads the equality operator.
member.returns: True if the objects are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.op_Inequality(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion,Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Overloads the inequality operator.
member.returns: True if the objects are not equal; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Overloads the less than operator.
member.returns: True the first object is less than the second object; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Overloads the less than or equal to operator.
member.returns: True the first object is less than or equal to the second object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.op_GreaterThan(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion,Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Overloads the greater than operator.
member.returns: True the first object is greater than the second object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion,Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Overloads the greater than or equal to operator.
member.returns: True the first object is greater than or equal to the second object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion.IsValidStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified status is valid.
member.returns: True if the status is valid; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: The status must be alphabetic or alphanumeric, start with a letter, and contain no spaces.

member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionFormatProvider
member.summary: Represents a format provider for API versions.

remarks.para: This format provider supports the following custom format strings:

item.description: The full, formatted API version where optional, absent components are omitted.
The full, formatted API version where optional components have default values.
The group version of the API group version.
The group version and status of the API group version.
The year of the API group version.
The month of the API group version.
The day of the API group version.
The minor version of the API version.
The major version of the API version.
The major and minor version of the API version.
The major version, optional minor version, and status of the API version.
The major version, minor version, and status of the API version.
The minor version of the API version with padded zeros. The default padding is for two digits.
The minor version of the API version with padded zeros where "n" is the total number of digits.
The major version of the API version with padded zeros. The default padding is for two digits.
The major version of the API version with padded zeros where "n" is the total number of digits.

member.content: Contains additional implementation specific to .NET Standard 1.0.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.value: A object.

member.value: The for the invariant culture.

member.summary: Formats the specified version using the provided format.

The used to apply the format.

member.summary: Formats the specified status part using the provided format.
member.param: The format string for the status.
The used to apply the format.

member.summary: Returns the formatter for the requested type.
member.returns: A , , or null depending on the requested format type.

member.summary: Formats the provided argument with the specified format and provider.
member.param: The format string to apply to the argument.
The used to format the argument.
member.returns: A string representing the formatted argument.

member.summary: Formats the specified group version using the provided format.

member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel
member.summary: Represents the version information for an API.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The declared version also represents the only implemented and supported API version.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Asp.Versioning.ApiVersion})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A sequence of supported API versions.
A sequence of deprecated API versions.
member.remarks: The constructed API version information is never version-neutral, implemented API versions are a union between the supported versions and deprecated versions, and the declared API versions are always empty since no controller or action has been specified.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The supported sequence of API versions.
The deprecated sequence of API versions.
The advertised sequence of API versions.
The deprecated, advertised sequence of API versions.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The declared sequence of API versions by an implementation.
The supported sequence of API versions.
The deprecated sequence of API versions.
The advertised sequence of API versions.
The deprecated, advertised sequence of API versions.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.Default
member.summary: Gets the default API version information.
member.value: The default API version information.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.Neutral
member.summary: Gets the neutral API version information.
member.value: The neutral API version information.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.Empty
member.summary: Gets empty API version information.
member.value: The empty API version information.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.IsApiVersionNeutral
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the API is version-neutral.
member.value: True if the API is version-neutral; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.DeclaredApiVersions
member.summary: Gets the API versions declared by an implementation.
member.value: A read-only list of API versions declared by an implementation.
member.remarks: The declared API versions are constrained to the versions declared explicitly by an implementation.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.ImplementedApiVersions
member.summary: Gets the versions implemented by the API.
member.value: A read-only list of implemented API versions.
member.remarks: The implemented API versions include the supported and deprecated API versions.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.SupportedApiVersions
member.summary: Gets the versions supported by the API.
member.value: A read-only list of support API versions.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel.DeprecatedApiVersions
member.summary: Gets the versions deprecated by the API.
member.value: A read-only list of deprecated API versions.
member.remarks: A deprecated API version does not mean it is not supported. A deprecated API version is typically advertised six months or more before it becomes unsupported; in which case, the API would no longer indicate that it is an implemented version.

member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModelExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModelExtensions.Aggregate(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel,Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel)
member.summary: Aggregates the current version information with other version information.
member.param: The API version information that is the basis of the aggregation.
The other API version information to aggregate.
member.returns: A new that is the aggregated result of the other version information and the current version information.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModelExtensions.Aggregate(Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel})
member.summary: Aggregates the current version information with other version information.
member.param: The API version information that is the basis of the aggregation.
A sequence of other API version information to aggregate.
member.returns: A new that is the aggregated result of the other version information and the current version information.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModelExtensions.Aggregate(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionModel})
member.summary: Aggregates a sequence of version information.
member.param: The API version information to aggregate.
member.returns: A new that is the aggregated result of the provided version information.

member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionProviderOptions
member.summary: Represents the possible API version provider options.

member.name: F:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionProviderOptions.None
member.summary: Indicates no options.

member.name: F:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionProviderOptions.Deprecated
member.summary: Indicates the provided API versions are deprecated.

member.name: F:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionProviderOptions.Advertised
member.summary: Indicates the provided API versions are only advertised.
member.remarks: Advertised service API versions indicate the existence of other versioned services, but the implementation of those services are implemented elsewhere.

member.name: F:Asp.Versioning.ApiVersionProviderOptions.Mapped
member.summary: Indicates the provided API versions are only mapped.
member.remarks: Mapped API versions indicate that the defined API versions are used for only meant to be used for mapping purposes. This option should not typically be combined with other options.

member.summary: Adds an API version parameter with the specified name, from the specified location.

member.summary: Defines the behavior of an object that is the source of API version parameters.

member.summary: Provides API version parameter descriptions supported by the current source using the supplied context.
member.param: The context used to add API version parameter descriptions.

member.summary: Provides extension methods for the interface.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSourceExtensions.VersionsByQueryString(Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified parameter source versions by query string.
member.param: True if multiple API version locations are allowed. False if the API version can only appear in a query string parameter. The default value is true.
member.returns: True if the parameter source versions by query string; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSourceExtensions.VersionsByHeader(Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified parameter source versions by HTTP header.
member.param: True if multiple API version locations are allowed. False if the API version can only appear in a HTTP header. The default value is true.
member.returns: True if the parameter source versions by HTTP header; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSourceExtensions.VersionsByUrl(Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified parameter source versions by URL path segment.
member.param: True if multiple API version locations are allowed. False if the API version can only appear in a URL path segment. The default value is true.
member.returns: True if the parameter source versions by URL path segment; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSourceExtensions.VersionsByMediaType(Asp.Versioning.IApiVersionParameterSource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified parameter source versions by media type.
member.param: True if multiple API version locations are allowed. False if the API version can only appear as a media type. The default value is true.
member.returns: True if the parameter source versions by media type; otherwise, false.

member.returns: The name of the first parameter defined by the parameter source for the specified or null.

Attempts to resolve a sunset policy for the specified name and API version combination.

and

member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue
member.summary: Represents a HTTP Link header value.
member.remarks: For more information see RFC 8288.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.#ctor(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The link relation type that identifies the semantics of the link.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.LinkTarget
member.summary: Gets the link target Uniform Resource Locator (URL).
member.value: The link target URL.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.RelationType
member.summary: Gets the link relation type.
member.value: The link relation type that identifies the semantics of the link.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language associated with the link.
member.value: A hint indicating what the language of the result of dereferencing the link should be.

remarks.para: This is only a hint; for example, it does not override the Content-Language header field of a HTTP response obtained by actually following the link. A single link may indicate that multiple languages are available from the indicated resource.
If the link has more than one associated language, this property always gets or sets the first language defined.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Languages
member.summary: Gets languages associated with the link.
member.value: A hint indicating what the language of the result of dereferencing the link should be.
member.remarks: This is only a hint; for example, it does not override the Content-Language header field of a HTTP response obtained by actually following the link. A single link may indicate that multiple languages are available from the indicated resource.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Media
member.summary: Gets or sets the link media.
member.value: Used to indicate intended destination medium or media for style information.
member.remarks: For more information see, The link element.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the link title.
member.value: Used to label the destination of the link such that it can be used as a human-readable identifier (e.g. "menu entry") in the language indicated by the Content-Language header field, if present.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the link type.
member.value: A hint indicating what the media type of the result of dereferencing the link should be.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Extensions
member.summary: Gets the target attribute extensions, if any.
member.value: A collection of key/value pairs representing the target attribute extensions.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.Parse(System.String,System.Func{System.Uri,System.Uri})
member.summary: Parses the specified header value.
member.param: The optional function used to resolve relative URLs.
member.remarks: For more information see RFC 8288 - Appendix B.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.TryParse(System.String,System.Func{System.Uri,System.Uri},Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse the specified header value.
member.param: The optional function used to resolve relative URLs.
A new LINK header value or null.
member.returns: True if the header is successfully parsed; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: For more information see RFC 8288 - Appendix B.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue.ParseList(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Func{System.Uri,System.Uri})
member.summary: Parses a sequence of inputs as a sequence of values.
member.param: The optional function used to resolve relative URLs.

member.summary: Attempts to parse the sequence of values as a sequence of .
member.param: The optional function used to resolve relative URLs.
member.returns: if all inputs are valid , otherwise .

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified API group version '{0}' is invalid..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified API version status '{0}' is invalid..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.ApiVersionInvalidFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified API version is invalid..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.EmptyKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The key cannot be empty..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.FirstCharMustBeLetter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The first character must be a letter..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.InvalidFormatString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Input string was not in a correct format..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.InvalidLinkKey
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Only letters, numbers, '-', and '_' are allowed..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.InvalidOrMalformedHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The header contains invalid or missing values..

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SR.InvalidSunsetRelationType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The relation type for a sunset policy link must be "sunset"..

member.name: T:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy
member.summary: Represents an API version sunset policy.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy.#ctor(System.DateTimeOffset,Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The date and time when the API version will be sunset.
The optional link which provides information about the sunset policy.

member.name: M:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy.#ctor(Asp.Versioning.LinkHeaderValue)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The link which provides information about the sunset policy.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy.Date
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the API version will be sunset.
member.value: The date and time when the API version will be sunset, if any.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy.HasLinks
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the sunset policy has any associated links.
member.value: True if the sunset policy has associated links; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asp.Versioning.SunsetPolicy.Links
member.summary: Gets a read-only list of links that provide information about the sunset policy.
member.value: A read-only list of HTTP links.
member.remarks: If a link is provided, generally only one link is necessary; however, additional links might be provided for different languages or different formats such as a HTML page or a JSON file.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BitOperations.RotateLeft(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the specified value left by the specified number of bits. Similar in behavior to the x86 instruction ROL.
member.param: The number of bits to rotate by. Any value outside the range [0..31] is treated as congruent mod 32.

member.name: M:Backport.ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Throws an if is null.
member.param: The reference type argument to validate as non-null.
The name of the parameter with which corresponds.
